text.section: In this section, "bodily fluid" means seminal fluid, blood, urine, or feces.

A person may not knowingly and willfully cause another to ingest bodily fluid:
without consent; or
by force or threat of force.
A person who violates subsection (b) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 10 years or a fine not exceeding $2,500 or both.
